description:
Layout section component with flexible content areas and optional side images.

Provides a structured container for page sections with configurable padding and background.
Supports three content slots (default, left, right) for flexible layouts. When image props
are provided, they render in the left/right slots automatically. Uses semantic design tokens
for consistent spacing and theming across the application.

Follows all 10 Component Standards with positional slot naming and CSS variable patterns.

props.name: size
props.description: Padding size using design token scale (s, m, l, xl, 2xl). Controls vertical padding via --space-{size} token.

props.name: backgroundColor
props.description: Background color token name (e.g., 'color-surface', 'color-primary'). Maps to --{backgroundColor} CSS variable.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: When true, section spans full viewport width. When false, content is constrained to container max-width.

props.name: imageLeft
props.description: Source URL for left-side image. Renders in #left slot when provided.

props.name: imageLeftAlt
props.description: Alt text for left-side image. Required for accessibility when imageLeft is provided.

props.name: imageRight
props.description: Source URL for right-side image. Renders in #right slot when provided.

props.name: imageRightAlt
props.description: Alt text for right-side image. Required for accessibility when imageRight is provided.
